website_summaries.verdict: The Pentax Optio WG-2 is a very good rugged camera with few trade-offs for its durability.
pros: The Pentax Optio WG-2 is a lightweight, but extremely rugged compact camera with some extra features and functions you won't find in competing models
cons: The WG-2's shooting performance isn't particularly fast and it only has digital image stabilization

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for family vacation.
customer_reviews.text: Water seemed to have gotten behind the lens second day of using it. Double checked every lock before using, so i'm sure it wasn't a human error. Was very disappointed. After using it for another day it the camera shut down and nothing got it to work again. Doesn't seem to happen with most people, but happened to my family and multiple others. On the positive side there is a one year warranty on the camera and after sending it to the company they compensated by giving us the new WG-3. Haven't tested out the WG-3 yet, no warrant this time, hope it doesn't happen again.
customer_reviews.author: TEMB

customer_reviews.title: Best Rugged Camera
customer_reviews.text: Did a great deal of research on rugged/outdoor cameras and i am very happy with this purchase. WG-2 has a ton of features and an excellent x5 zoom and macro. It has held up through many kayak trips and hikes. The only CON is that I thought it had more of a rubbery shell to help with the shock protection but it is just a hard plastic. This does not effect the cameras capabilities but the camera will get a little nicked up. not a big deal at all is a little different than it appears in the picture..
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very good pictures
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to use on a two day rafting trip knowing that it would get very wet. It performed pretty well, including video. However, it is possible, or probable, that you will have times when you miss a picture or starting video because you haven't released the shutter. This was a constant problem when my wife was using the camera and occasionally with me. The camera does have shutter lag a little more than I expected. It does have small buttons, which were a problem at times. Definitely practice using the camera before trying to take important shots.
customer_reviews.author: NMmaster

customer_reviews.title: Definitely lives up to the hype.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome point and shoot camera, especially for those who like to be outdoors. I bought it shortly after I deployed and it's endured multiple missions and the varied temperature and terrain well. I've tested this camera and have done everything with the exception of immersing it in water and it hasn't failed me yet. If you love being outdoors are looking for a small camera to take with you then Pentax Optio WG-2 Digital Camera is a definite must.
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah Ratey

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and durable
customer_reviews.text: I've taken it camping, canoeing, tubing, skiing, sledding, swimming... pretty much everywhere I've gone. For outdoor adventures, it's a pretty good camera. If I was an extremely active outdoorsman, I may have gone for the GoPro. But as a recreational outdoor fella, this works just fine. For indoor shots, you need to find the proper setting for the lighting. My advice would be to take some test pics before the event you want to capture in order to determine the proper setting. Don't miss out on a great shot of your precious people because of 'operator error'!
customer_reviews.author: JeffreyG

customer_reviews.title: Bullet Proof Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is bullet proof. I have been using it everyday for about 2 years now and it is still going strong. In my line of work, I photograph vehicles for collision repair and purchase a camera at least once a year. This camera has survived countless drops and banging it up against crashed cars a million times. I believe this camera will out live me HAHA...
customer_reviews.author: Billy Brady

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality ia acceptable for a point-and-shoot, but durability is what matters here. This camera has been dropped onto the asphalt (twice) from a moving motorcycle, used in rain and snow (again on a moving motorcycle) and underwater in fresh, salt, and chlorinated pool water. Still performs like a champ. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Just received our awesome new camera and took it with us to Cozumel, enjoyed having a rugged camera to tote through airports and cabs. It fits perfectly in my purse and we didn't need to bring my nice big camera. Got great shots there and feel they are up to par with my big Canon. Great purchase, going to bring it along with us to a mud run coming up!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Solid camera in testing
customer_reviews.text: I am getting ready to take this on my carribean cruise honeymoon and really give it its testing. I have used it some leading up to the trip to learn it and like it. It does not produce the best indoor pictures as the coloring is a little off but it is not menat to replace my DSLR. If i feel strongly one way or the other after the trip i will update.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Strodtman

customer_reviews.title: Solid Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have used this camera twice on hikes. It takes decent but not fantastic shots. It is easy to use, I didn't have to read the manual to figure it out. It is rugged and I found out that it can be dropped without breaking. Thought I hooked in securely on my pack but when I stood up it dropped about 4 feet onto solid rock and there were no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Higdon

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Have used it wet and dry. Clear movies and stills underwater and on land. Auto settings works pretty well for me, an unseasoned amateur. Low light settings are not too grainy. All of the different features are really fun to play with and easy to use. Works great to image hummingbirds in our yard. I bought it thinking I would buy the remote, but did not as it is disposable and the remote has to be thrown out when batteries die.
customer_reviews.author: R S

customer_reviews.title: great so far
customer_reviews.text: I opened it and took it camping to rivers and waterfalls, and so far its wonderful. However, Reading the manual I discovered that rubber seals must be changed every year, I wish I had known that before.
customer_reviews.author: Ptroff

customer_reviews.title: easy to use system to change camera modes
customer_reviews.text: Shock proof, waterproof, easy to use system to change camera modes...I love it. This is my second Pentax Optio, I had the original for almost 8 years! There is a good reason why I stuck with this model
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera so I can bring it kayaking and not have to worry about it getting wet. It works awesome and takes beautiful pictures. The underwater pictures and video is amazingly clear and takes great pictures. I also use this camera for snowmobiling and it works well for this too. I have used it in 8 below weather and it turns right on and works great. It doesn't need to kept in a "camera bag" because it is a really durable camera. It is very easy to use too. I would defintely recommend this camera for someone who is active and doesn't want to worry about damaging they're camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amyleigh

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, especially for its price.
customer_reviews.text: Received the product and it has already been tested for its quality. survived being rained on and dropped in a creek, also survived being dropped multiple times. The digital microscope feature on the camera is by far my favorite and it was impressive that it could pick up the detail of the bark on a tree at extreme close up ranges. overall satisfied with the purchase and so far have had no hiccups with it.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: We took this to Hawaii. Lots and Lots of water time. It is a great camera, the picture quality is good and all the different features are an added plus. I love smile capture. Everyone wanted to know what kind of camera it was, I couldn't say enough good things about it to total strangers.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to take on our Carribean vacation. It works great! Has lots of extra features but is very easy to use and takes good photos
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl B.

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor camera !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome !! its water proof and it can take a beating . Pics are of good quality . You can take video as well. Battery last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: maebyroots

customer_reviews.title: Great for adventure seekers.
customer_reviews.text: Strapped it to my life jacket when I water skied and got some awesome pics. Nearly indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Soisson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was great to have a rugged backpacking camera that isn't easy to break. Before taking out to the high sierras, I took a few pics underwater in a swimming pool. They turned out amazing with great lighting and detail all around. Thforensic I took it for a 3 day backpacking trip. It fit nicely in my hip belt, just point and shoot. The clarity and ability to zoom so far away exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: DRR

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: already used it many times in and out of he water, very durable, even the zoom is great, I wish it had some sort of wrist band to hold it
customer_reviews.author: A-N

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good waterproof camera....the compartment for battery and sd card are very hard to open.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew MacMillan

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Seems durable. Definitely functions well in/around water. Survived a day in and out of my pocket at the water park. Easy to use once you learn the functions. Waterproof hatches (battery cover, etc) not the easiest to use compared to other models looked at, but so far, they do their jobs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much this the second one I have bought.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is tuff and is a Cmos unit. works well under water, deeper than I can free dive. Looks different and feels different in the hand. Works better than a Go Pro Hero. Just, came back from Bonneville, it was mounted beside the Go Pro black (399.00) and did as well and I think better. For 199.99 free to my door in 4 days. (We went 289 mph)
customer_reviews.author: Mearl D Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera to take with us to Jamaica. We used the camera in the pool and in the ocean while snorkeling. Camera performed well. Pictures turned out sharp. Did not have any problems with it leaking. Would recommend this camera
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: great value and versatility
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Easy to use, great versatility. Especially enjoy the slow motion video and macro abilities. Small enough to fit my shirt pocket. Rugged enough to survive my outdoor adventures. A perfect "step up" from my first point and shoot digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Diel

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera for a recent ski trip and for my wife to use at the pool with our child during the summer months. The camera performed perfect on the mountain in all conditions. The battery lasted for multiple days and the picture quality both inside and outside is what I would expect from a good point and shoot. Also, the price is great. If you are not worried about GPS tagging your photos for FaceBook this is the camera for you.
customer_reviews.author: Will Stimpson

customer_reviews.title: ended up returning
customer_reviews.text: was very big and bulky for my grand daughter she is sooooo hard on her cameras wanted her to have in college but she didn't like it sure it is a great camera, just not for our use that is why i didn't diss the camera or vendor
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Goodkin

customer_reviews.title: great for kayak fishing.
customer_reviews.text: So glad I upgraded my fishing camera. The Kodak Playsport was not getting the job done anymore. I have taken some great pics with this camera. Color is sharp and pictures are great.
customer_reviews.author: CTG21

customer_reviews.title: THis thing is a tank
customer_reviews.text: If you run mud runs or trail run/hike in bad weather, this is the camera for you. All the covers work to keep the mud out.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Takes crummy pictures - I returned it and got the Optio WG-3 for about $100 more.
customer_reviews.text: Pictures were fuzzy and grainy no matter what I did, what kind of light I was in, or what speed memory card was used. Shell out the extra $$ and go for the WG3, just released in March 2013. It resolves some of these issues plus has "real" image stabilization, and is even tougher than the WG2.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, took to Hawaii and got greatest pics from underwater to mountaintop. Recommend 100% Battery life good, no problems
customer_reviews.author: Lori P.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera!
customer_reviews.text: It is the only point & shoot camera with ring led light, use your imagination and use this camera for many purposes.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: took this camera to Costa Rica, picture quality is good, but not great. functions are easy to use. Screen is large and easy to see. Haven't tested the water proof capability yet, but it seems like the seals on the protected compartments are a little loose, we'll see. I do a lot of kayaking, so as soon as summer gets here, that will be the true test. overall a good camera for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Full featured and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste any more time researching cameras. Just lock it down and buy this one. I have already used this for about 6 months and have not had a single problem.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Survived the oceans and jungles of Costa Rica!
customer_reviews.text: While I am not a professional photographer, I have doing landscape photography for over a decade. I bought this camera specifically to take to Costa Rica with me because I knew I would be doing white water rafting. I went into the ocean with it (though I tried to keep it above water as much as possible), under waterfalls, in jungles, and it survived very well. Some of the photo's I got were absolutely amazing. I would suggest to buy an extra battery. Very rugged and exactly what I was looking for. After traveling with it for 2 weeks, I have no cons to add.
customer_reviews.author: OB

customer_reviews.title: its a good point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: I really like the microscope mode .and it's rated the best point and shoot too so , I would defenetly recommend this for outdoors .
customer_reviews.author: kalyana

customer_reviews.title: Super Rugged and Great Picture Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has given me great pictures. I''ve dropped it several times and it's super-rugged. The picture quality is great. I'd recommend it to anyone!!
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: One happy son
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the camera. My only problem was with DB Roth and that it took eleven days to get here (after Christmas). He has discovered that this camera has alot of features to do fun things with.
customer_reviews.author: denise boone

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I have not used it alot, But for what I have used it for it has been great. This camera has more features then I know how to use and I am excited to be able to use them all. The drop proof and waterproof is exactly what I was lookign for for taking on the boat and in the woods. I also have kids and its great if they happen to get ahold of it. Shutterspeed, picture quality, start up speed, the physical tough look, all are awesome. I get many compliments on the look of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: profisha

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time in water-filled up with water
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time of gentle use in water, camera filled up with water. never dropped or mishandled, supposed to be the toughest camera-i think not
customer_reviews.author: Courtney L

customer_reviews.title: Works okay
customer_reviews.text: Nice grips if you are wearing dive glove. However, it is harder to compete with newer models that's coming out with more feature at lowered costs.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Young

customer_reviews.title: pentax optio WG2 digital camers
customer_reviews.text: The camera was described as having a slightly damaged package but when I received it , it was missing two pieces : The carabiner strap and the macro stand . This was not mentioned in the product description . I was very disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: josie

product_meta.title: Pentax Optio WG-2 Kit
product_meta.description: Your roughest journeys and days on the mountain were made for the Pentax Optio WG-2 Camera Kit, which easily captures the fast-paced action and tiny details of any trip. This incredibly durable 16-megapixel point-and-shoot camera is waterproof, dustproof, coldproof, shockproof, crushproof, and still capable of professional-level images and full 1080p HD video. The 36X combined zoom and macro focus ring help capture images of canyon walls a mile away, insect mandibles one centimeter away, and everything in between. The flash, autofocus assist lamp, and manual focus help you get the shot despite challenging light conditions. Don't limit yourself to POV shots or blurry photos. This expedition-proof digital camera documents it all with its many modes, including still images, HD video, and even audio sound files.
